subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Brian Johnson has led No. 10 Utah to a 9-0 record, and if the Utes beat No. 11 Texas Christian University on Thursday they would be on the cusp of a berth in a B.C.S. bowl game.
snippet: Quarterback Brian Johnson has led No. 10 Utah to a 9-0 record, and if the Utes beat No. 11 Texas Christian University on Thursday they would be on the cusp of a berth in a B.C.S. bowl game.
